title: NORTH BY NORTHWEST typeface
content:
Can anyone identify this typeface used in Alfred Hitchcock's 1959 thriller, "North By Northwest"?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109174917im_/http:/typophile.com/files/North%20By%20Northwest%20title_4394.png)
author: steviebaby

comments.content: I would say some obviously pre-digital version of Franklin Gothic condensed. See, for example, here: [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/frank-goth/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109174917/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/frank-goth/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/tilde/frank-goth/")
